targets.query:
from(bucket: "HomePower")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "Solar")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.Phase == "Loja")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "power")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield()

from(bucket: "HomePower")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "PowerBox")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.Phase == "Loja")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "power")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield()

from(bucket: "HomePower")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "Solar")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.Phase == "Cozinha")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "power")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield()

from(bucket: "HomePower")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "PowerBox")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.Phase == "Cozinha")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "power")

  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)

  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.Phase == "Casa")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "power")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)

from(bucket: "HomePower")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)

  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.Phase == "Casa")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "power")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield()

from(bucket: "HomePower")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "Solar")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.Phase == "Loja")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "voltage")
  |> last()
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "HomePower")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "Solar")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.Phase == "Loja")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "current")
  |> last()
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "HomePower")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "Solar")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.Phase == "Loja")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "power-factor")
  |> last()
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "HomePower")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "Solar")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.Phase == "Loja")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "power")
  |> last()

from(bucket: "HomePower")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "Solar")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.Phase == "Loja")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "energy")
  |> last()
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "HomePower")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "Solar")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.Phase == "Loja")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "freq")
  |> last()
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "HomePower")
  |> range(start: today(), stop: now())
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "Solar")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.Phase == "Loja")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "energy")
  |> window(every: 1d)
  |> spread()
  |> last()
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _value: r._value * 0.1982 }) )
  |> yield()

from(bucket: "HomePower")
  |> range(start: -1mo, stop: now())
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "Solar")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.Phase == "Loja")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "energy")
  |> window(every: 7d)
  |> spread()
  |> group(columns: ["host", "_measurement"], mode:"by")
  |> last()
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _value: r._value * 0.1982 }) )
  |> yield()

from(bucket: "HomePower")
  |> range(start: -1mo, stop: now())
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "Solar")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.Phase == "Loja")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "energy")
  |> window(every: 28d)
  |> spread()
  |> group(columns: ["host", "_measurement"], mode:"by")
  |> last()
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _value: r._value * 0.1982 }) )
  |> yield()

  |> group(columns: ["host", "_field"], mode:"by")
  |> sum()

from(bucket: "HomePower")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "ESP32")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.Device == "PowerBox" or r.Device == "Solar")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "wifi-rssi")
  |> last()
  |> yield(name: "last")

  |> sum()
  |> yield()
